verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD הַֽ֭לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem ye the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu praise עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei [him] O ye servants יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

שֶׁ֣֭עֹֽמְדִים <S%H5975><s%> 'O-me-dim Ye that stand בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD בְּ֝חַצְר֗וֹת <S%H2691><s%> be-chatz-Rot, in the courts בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God

הַֽ֭לְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu- Praise יָהּ <S%H3050><s%> yah the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [is] good יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; for the LORD זַמְּר֥וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru sing praises לִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹ <S%H8034><s%> lish-Mo, unto his name כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נָעִֽים׃ <S%H5273><s%> na-'Im. for [it is] pleasant

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob בָּחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> ba-Char hath chosen ל֣וֹ lo יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah; For the LORD יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, unto himself [and] Israel לִסְגֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5459><s%> lis-gul-la-To. for his peculiar treasure

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Ya-da'-ti For I know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גָד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] great יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that the LORD וַ֝אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <S%H136><s%> va-'a-do-Nei-nu, our Lord מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. [is] above all gods

כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fetz pleased יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Whatsoever the LORD עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah [that] did בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim he in heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> u-va-'A-retz; and in earth בַּ֝יַּמִּ֗ים <S%H3220><s%> bai-yam-Mim, in the seas וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> te-ho-Mot. and all deep places

מַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ma-'a-Leh to ascend נְשִׂאִים֮ <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Im He causeth the vapours מִקְצֵ֪ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh from the ends הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth בְּרָקִ֣ים <S%H1300><s%> be-ra-Kim lightnings לַמָּטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> lam-ma-Tar for the rain עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; he maketh מֽוֹצֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> mo-tze- he bringeth ר֝וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach the wind מֵאֽוֹצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H214><s%> me-'otz-ro-Tav. out of his treasuries

שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <S%H5221><s%> hik-kah Who smote בְּכוֹרֵ֣י <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Rei the firstborn מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt מֵ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> me-'a-Dam, both of man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah. and beast

שָׁלַ֤ח׀ <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach [Who] sent אֹת֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> o-Tot tokens וּ֭מֹפְתִים <S%H4159><s%> U-mo-fe-tim and wonders בְּתוֹכֵ֣כִי <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Che-chi into the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of thee O Egypt בְּ֝פַרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> be-far-'Oh, upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol and all עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav. and upon all his servants

שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <S%H5221><s%> hik-kah Who smote גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim nations רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; great וְ֝הָרַ֗ג <S%H2026><s%> ve-ha-Rag, and slew מְלָכִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings עֲצוּמִֽים׃ <S%H6099><s%> 'a-tzu-Mim. mighty

לְסִיח֤וֹן׀ <S%H5511><s%> le-si-Chon Sihon מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites וּ֭לְעוֹג <S%H5747><s%> U-le-'og and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan; of Bashan וּ֝לְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> u-le-Chol, and all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-le-Chot and all the kingdoms כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam their land נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah; [for] an heritage נַ֝חֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah, an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo. his people

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD שִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> shim-Cha Thy name לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; [endureth] for ever יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD זִכְרְךָ֥ <S%H2143><s%> zich-re-Cha [and] thy memorial לְדֹר־ <S%H1755><s%> le-dor- throughout all וָדֹֽר׃ <S%H1755><s%> va-Dor. generations

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> ya-Din will judge יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo; his people וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on עֲ֝בָדָ֗יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav, himself concerning his servants יִתְנֶחָֽם׃ <S%H5162><s%> yit-ne-Cham. and he will repent

עֲצַבֵּ֣י <S%H6091><s%> 'a-tzab-Bei The idols הַ֭גּוֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> Hag-go-yim of the heathen כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav; and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh, the work יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei hands אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men's

פֶּֽה־ <S%H6310><s%> peh- They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> La-hem like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru; but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yim not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem, like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U. have they but they see

אָזְנַ֣יִם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Na-yim They have ears לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> La-hem like וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <S%H238><s%> ya-'a-Zi-nu; but they hear אַ֝֗ף <S%H637><s%> 'Af, all אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- Nor יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- not neither is there ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach [any] breath בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6310><s%> be-fi-Hem. in their mouths

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <S%H3644><s%> Ke-mo-hem will be like יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> 'o-sei-Hem; They that make כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> kol them everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> bo-Te-ach them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el of Israel בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house הַ֭לֵּוִי <S%H3878><s%> Hal-le-vi of Levi בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD יִֽרְאֵ֥י <S%H3373><s%> yir-'Ei ye that fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בָּרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh be the LORD מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> mitz-tzi-Yon, out of Zion שֹׁ֘כֵ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> sho-Chen which dwelleth יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, at Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
